events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer position submitted by the candidate and will begin processing it shortly.
The application has been categorised under the engineering cluster based on the candidate's experience in software development and devops skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate's hiring process for the engineering role to ensure smooth communication and follow-up.
Initial screening of the candidate was conducted via phone call focusing on their software engineering background and problem-solving capabilities.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm about the role and confirming availability for the next round of interviews.
We have scheduled the technical interview for the candidate with the senior engineering team to assess coding skills and system design knowledge.
